actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Concurrent resolution calling for a domestic summit to develop a unified plan of action to restore stability and prosperity to the American economy.

summary.text: Provides that, notwithstanding the provisions of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, the House of Representatives and the Senate shall not adjourn for a period in excess of three days, or adjourn sine die, until both Houses of Congress have adopted a concurrent resolution providing either for an adjournment (in excess of three days) to a day certain, or for adjournment sine die.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution calling for a domestic summit to develop a unified plan of action to restore stability and prosperity to the American economy.
